# GitHub Copilot Instructions for Chunk Docs

## Project Context
Central documentation hub for the Chunk ecosystem. Contains architecture, API reference, contributing guidelines, and specs.

## Writing Style
- Concise and scannable
- Use headers and lists
- Code examples where helpful
- Link to other docs instead of duplicating

## Structure
- README.md - Overview and navigation
- ARCHITECTURE.md - Platform explanation
- API.md - API reference
- CONTRIBUTING.md - Contribution guide
- Specs in separate files

## Markdown
- Use relative links between docs
- Code blocks with language tags
- Tables for structured data
- Emojis sparingly for visual breaks

## Don't
- No long paragraphs
- No duplicated content
- No outdated information
- No implementation details (link to repos)
